title: English Clock for Wear
summary: The time the way you would read it
description: This is a watchface for Android Wear.The time unit is 5 minutes. As an example, "ten past ten" will be displayed from 10:08 to 10:12.If you are not comfortable with approximation, do not install this watchface.There is no configuration screen.
descriptionHTML:
This is a watchface for Android Wear.

The time unit is 5 minutes. As an example, "ten past ten" will be displayed from 10:08 to 10:12.
If you are not comfortable with approximation, do not install this watchface.

There is no configuration screen.
comments: How time is told Very simple watchface, that tells the time as it should be. Quick and easy to read.
